entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
